title: Sierra Leone Inflation Rate MoM
description: The Consumer Price Index in Sierra Leone increased 1.96 percent in September of 2022 over the previous month. Inflation Rate MoM in Sierra Leone averaged 0.89 percent from 2007 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 4.70 percent in March of 2022 and a record low of -37.60 percent in September of 2016. Inflation Rate MoM measures month over month change in the price of goods and services. This page provides - Sierra Leone Inflation Rate MoM- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Statistics Sierra Leone
